body: Dhampirs are defined by class levels—they don't possess racial Hit Dice. All dhampirs have the following racial traits.
name: Dhampir

sections.body: Dhampirs are fast and seductive, but closer to death than most mortals.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, -2 Constitution

sections.body: +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Perception.
sections.name: Manipulative

sections.body: Dhampirs gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against disease and mind-affecting effects.
sections.name: Undead Resistance

sections.body: See Universal Monster Rules/Negative Energy Affinity
sections.name: Negative Energy Affinity

sections.body: A dhampir can use detect undead three times per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability equals the dhampir's class level.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability

sections.body: Dhampirs begin play speaking Common. Those with high Intelligence can choose any language as a bonus language (except druidic and other secret languages).
sections.name: Languages
